about_the_game:
After seven years away, the white cat Lumi returns to his hometown, which is now descending into a sinister darkness that twists reality and devours memories.



Step into Lumi's paws and gain courage, wisdom, and mystical feline abilities.

Rediscover your past. Save your future!

Dive deep into the emotional themes of memory, identity, and family secrets. Rekindle old flames that burn bright even in the darkest nights. Outsmart imaginative puzzles and unravel side mysteries.

Choose your relationships wisely to unlock all endings. Leave your mark on a beautifully crafted world, inspired by a real-world town in Portugal.

GAMEPLAY MECHANICS

  • Visual novel dialogues with choices affecting the plot and relationships
  • Point-and-click exploration across many interactive, fanciful locations
  • RPG-style skill development unlocking Lumi's mystical and personal powers
  • Adventure-style inventory puzzles to challenge your wits

Join a diverse cast of animal friends like intellectual fox Adrian and spirited squirrel Clara. Dive into many unique story arcs overflowing with humor, romance and supernatural mystery. Immerse yourself in warm and enchanting original music. And unlock mystical abilities through Lumi's mom's music spells and dad's secret scientific experiments.



FEATURES

  • Diverse story arcs with a 10+ character cast
  • 3 romanceable classmates to pursue a relationship
  • Original 12-track soundtrack
  • Hidden lore and secrets to discover across side quests
  • Multiple endings (no dying!) based on your critical choices

White Cat Town Mystery aims to be satisfying and curious with surprising scenarios and charming illustrations. Forge your own path. Make your choices matter. And take a stand against the darkness. This town's and Lumi's destiny rests in your paws alone.

Come enjoy the deep storytelling with unpredictable twists around every corner.

White Cat Town Mystery seeks to deliver an unforgettable experience for narrative adventure fans!

Family friendly!

name: White Cat Town Mystery Demo
short_description: White Cat Town Mystery is a visual novel/adventure game about an anthropomorphic cat named Lumi. Help him explore atmospheric and magical town, meet old friends again, make hard choices, and go through supernatural challenges. What you choose decides the fate of the town—and Lumi himself!
